entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who is being interrogated by Harry. He is described as having tears gushing from his sagging eyes and gasping for breath.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one doing the interrogation. He is described as kneeling beside Kreacher and snorting at Hermione's suggestion to let him up.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is present in the scene and whispers a suggestion to Harry.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is described as a sneak thief who stole the locket. Kreacher saw him coming out of his cupboard with his hands full of treasures.

entities.name: master regulus
entities.description: Master Regulus is mentioned by Harry and Kreacher in relation to the locket. Kreacher calls it 'Master Regulus's'.

relationships.description: Harry is interrogating Kreacher about the locket and its connection to Master Regulus.
Kreacher saw Mundungus Fletcher stealing from his cupboard, which implies that Kreacher was the victim of theft.
